channel.title: SWN Frontiers
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Notes about Premise
item.description: Can we lease TL5 items from the company? Rather than pay 40% up front can we pay 50/60% over time? Do we get a stake in ongoing trade deals? Can I make a device that blasts people away? Not necessarily doing damage. I want my robot to have a large shield that when hit for the first time (until I 'reload' it) causes a blast of air or something to throw people away? Can I have solar panels mod on my robot that allows me to slot in batteries to recharge? If my bot has heal can I do cyberware
